content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate on the rental price. However, I must inform you that I am unable to provide you with a rental price within your budget. My goal as a landlord is to maximize my gains, and I believe that the rental price I am proposing is fair and reasonable based on the market value of similar apartments in the area. I hope you can understand my position and we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Would you be willing to schedule a follow-up meeting to discuss this further?
name: Heinrich Heine
